title: Classroom Video Utilization Competency Development Program for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theory and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments using digital devices for administrators/leaders with extensive science education field experience

learning_goals: Analyze classroom videos to explain science teachers' instructional strategies using a cognitive framework
Apply a situational approach to connect problem scenarios in classroom videos to real-world cases and propose improvement plans
Develop actionable instructional models that incorporate video analysis results in science lesson design through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
